speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Whew, the summer’s hot, isn’t it? How’s your work going?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: After a long day of work, I just like to kick back with a nice…cold…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: The other day, I was about to settle back in my chair with a beer, but my youngest daughter, Maya stuck a popsicle in the beer.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: She said, “This is to make sure your drink is cold, daddy!”

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: That was so sweet of her, but my beer…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: I ended up thanking her and eating a beer-soaked popsicle. And you know, it wasn’t half-bad!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Anyway, looks like yer receiving a lot more love notes lately, eh? I got a response for you.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Don’t read them all at once!
